holidays.desc: The main reason people travel is for holidays : almost one in two people travel for the pleasure of going on holidays.

family.desc: The second main reason people travel, after holidays, is for family reasons (it's nearly a quarter!).

business.desc: People also travel for work reasons : to work abroad or to set up their own business.

other.desc: There are also many other reasons : 7% of people travel to eat, meet people, explore...
